name: SomeoneisWatching_DEMO
description:
'Someone is Watching' is an interactive movie game. 

You will play the role of an amnesiac who wakes up in a locked basement and is forced to participate in a seven-day surveillance mission. Operate the computer in front of you, monitor the action, decipher codes, steal information and do everything you can to find out the secrets behind all of this. More importantly, you want to know who you are and how you are going to get out of here.
